channel.title: Visual Studio Solutions :: Data Structures in C#
channel.description: Visual Studio Solutions All code developed within Visual Studio 2022 must belong to one or more solutions. When you are using Visual Studio to develop a program, you will be working with a single solution. A solution will contain one or more projects. Each of these projects may belong to more than one solution. Each project typically contains several files, including source code files. Each file will typically belong to only one project.
